result.execSummary:
The defendant Hevane Richards was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Hevane Richards

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
2:08 P.M.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and requests reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  DA recites agreement, upon plea to count 1 without the place enhancer will request a fine plus court costs and upon plea to 2014FO116, will request a fine plus costs.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST to count 1 without the place enhancer.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty to count one and strikes the place enhancer.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  DA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  Sentencing statement by DA.  No statement by the defendant.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST to 2014FO116.  Court finds the defendant guilty.

Court sentences the defendant to:

2015CM2 - $100 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

2014FO116 - $200 forfeiture plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

Defendant is to complete processing.

Court adjourned at 2:19 p.m.
